Author: Enriath
Name: Fractal Continuum
Description: This plugin will synchronize your Penumbra mods and current Glamourer state with other paired clients automatically.
Punchline: Let others see you as you see yourself.
Changelog: - Automated build workflows, and a few changes to facilitate it. - Name has been updated in the installer (hopefully to mitigate the loading issue in Dalamud) - Version now uses the revision, though I won't be incrementing it. I hate C# building.
